text: E bar fo, arazir kaba me dav kɨm suam, da nɨghnɨzir aghuibar gɨn zui. Da guizbangɨra bar puvatɨ. Arazir kaba ghaze, ia uari uan ifongiamɨn gɨn mangɨva mɨghɨghvɨra Godɨn ziam fer arazibar amu. Egha ghaze, ia uarigh ifarɨva uari dɨkabɨn. Egha ghaze, ia Godɨn ingangarim damuva uan mɨkarzim mɨzazir kuram a danɨng. Egh arazir kaba, da en mɨkarzibar akuragh navir ghurimɨn araziba dɨkabɨragh da gɨvaghan kogham. Bar puvatɨgham.
